column5: Time for a new one. I've got a good jacket. Willing to spend up to $150.  Hit me with your recommendations.

I just bought the BassPro Pro Qualifier bib pant. I haven't even worn it out yet, but even just trying it  on I could tell that it was high quality. There are tons of positive reviews of it online. Main downside is it's quite pricey.
I have had the pro qualifier set for 3 years now with no issues.  Highly recommended.
Wetskins at CTC are good quality & in your budget.  Bright yellow color available for safety reasons.
